name: Xrbia
overview: Xrbia are real estate developers in the affordable housing sector, headquartered in Pune. Their projects span across Mumbai, Nagpur, Delhi and Pune and are designed by renowned architect Hafeez Contractor across India. Xrbia builds houses 3 times faster than its competitors through the use of System Form Work Technology which is an eco-friendly load-bearing wall panel system. Xrbia is registered under the IGBC rating system and considers the environmental impact of its choice of design, materials used, construction practices etc. Xrbia eliminates negative environmental impact by focusing on design, water & waste management, energy efficiency and smart selection of construction materials.
